Confidence intervals for
improvement in R-squared
are generated using
the `DeltaRSqNB()` function from the `betaNB` package.
In this example,
we use the data set and the model used in
[betaNB: Example Using the BetaNB Function](example-beta-nb.html).


``` r
library(betaNB)
```




``` r
df <- betaNB::nas1982
```

### Regression

Fit the regression model using the `lm()` function.


``` r
object <- lm(QUALITY ~ NARTIC + PCTGRT + PCTSUPP, data = df)
```

### Nonparametric Bootstrap


``` r
nb <- NB(object)
```

### Improvement in R-squared

#### Normal-Theory Approach


``` r
out <- DeltaRSqNB(nb, alpha = 0.05)
```

## Methods

### summary

Summary of the results of `DeltaRSqNB()`.

#### Percentile Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "pc")
#> Call:
#> DeltaRSqNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Improvement in R-squared
#> type = "pc"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.1859 0.0581 5000 0.0832 0.3129
#> PCTGRT  0.1177 0.0487 5000 0.0345 0.2246
#> PCTSUPP 0.0569 0.0340 5000 0.0075 0.1349
```

#### Bias Corrected Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "bc")
#> Call:
#> DeltaRSqNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Improvement in R-squared
#> type = "bc"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.1859 0.0581 5000 0.0914 0.3318
#> PCTGRT  0.1177 0.0487 5000 0.0433 0.2419
#> PCTSUPP 0.0569 0.0340 5000 0.0110 0.1492
```

#### Bias Corrected and Accelerated Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "bca")
#> Call:
#> DeltaRSqNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Improvement in R-squared
#> type = "bca"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.1859 0.0581 5000 0.0949 0.3398
#> PCTGRT  0.1177 0.0487 5000 0.0473 0.2568
#> PCTSUPP 0.0569 0.0340 5000 0.0100 0.1448
```

### coef

Return the vector of estimates.


``` r
coef(out)
#>    NARTIC    PCTGRT   PCTSUPP 
#> 0.1858925 0.1176542 0.0568722
```

### vcov

Return the sampling covariance matrix.


``` r
vcov(out)
#>                NARTIC        PCTGRT       PCTSUPP
#> NARTIC   0.0033798214 -0.0002502992 -0.0002442079
#> PCTGRT  -0.0002502992  0.0023707916 -0.0003020950
#> PCTSUPP -0.0002442079 -0.0003020950  0.0011570794
```

### confint

Return confidence intervals.

#### Percentile Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "pc")
#>               2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.083232612 0.3128911
#> PCTGRT  0.034515414 0.2245659
#> PCTSUPP 0.007463023 0.1349275
```

#### Bias Corrected Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "bc")
#>              2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.09136578 0.3317811
#> PCTGRT  0.04326964 0.2418691
#> PCTSUPP 0.01104394 0.1492032
```

#### Bias Corrected and Accelerated Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "bca")
#>              2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.09490170 0.3398386
#> PCTGRT  0.04727741 0.2567870
#> PCTSUPP 0.00995364 0.1448291
```
